Author: egorxe
Content: The latest PR from Leo relaxing overly strict Klayout antenna checks (considering whole diode area) [was merget 4 hours ago](https://github.com/wafer-space/gf180mcu/pull/13). Do you have it in already? There is also one from me which is still not merged, but it will make KLayout checks more strict due to proper Metal5 thickness, so it does not look like your problem.
